load libraries 

```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(ggtree)
```

plot the tree of the representative sequences 

```{r, fig.width=9, fig.height=7}
# Read the data
tree <- read.tree("cluster_rep/colicin.tree")

ggtree(tree) + geom_tiplab() + ggplot2::xlim(0, 0.51) 
```
